stepOne.title: Choose
stepOne.desc: Select currencies you want to swap and click the exchange button.

stepTwo.title: Enter
stepTwo.desc: The currency you want to receive will be sent to this address after the exchange.

stepThree.title: Send
stepThree.desc: To continue, send the indicated amount of coins to the deposit address.

stepFour.title: That’s all
stepFour.desc: The exchange status “Finished” means that the swap process is over.

success.title: Success
success.desc: Usually, funds arrive within 15 minutes. If not, please contact us.

advantages.title: We Are The Most Trusted Cryptocurrency Platform.
advantages.desc: We believe Cryptolly is here to stay — and that a future worth building is one which opens its doors and invites everyone in.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.desc: SimpleSwap provides cryptocurrency exchange without registration.

choice.title: Wide choice
choice.desc: Hundreds of crypto and fiat currencies are available for exchange.

support.title: 24/7 support
support.desc: Our support team is easy to reach and ready to answer your questions.

safety.title: Safety
safety.desc: Crypto is sent directly to your wallet, we don’t store it on our service.

supportedCoins.title: Supported Coins
supportedCoins.desc: We support 21 distinctive cryptocurrencies, providing you with a broad spectrum of digital asset choices. Join Cryptolly to discover and invest in your preferred coins.

partners.title: Partners
partners.desc: We are proud to collaborate with leading players in the crypto industry who help us ensure the reliability and innovation of our services. Here are some of our partners:
